content.question: In Paragraph 4 ("In creating ... converged"), the author describes the relationship between

choices.label: female writers who sought attention and the audiences they attempted to please
the artistic freedom that female writers enjoyed and the social constraints they had to endure
literature that inspired women and the diaries and letters women produced
writing in seclusion and discussing literature in small circles with other women

content.answer: literature that inspired women and the diaries and letters women produced

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
